model

Class ExpertAIPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.Player
        • model.ExpertAIPlayer

  • public class ExpertAIPlayer
extends Player
    Computer player. Should be the most skilled of the three, consistently beating Simple and Intermediate computer players, and should be a challenge for human players to beat.
    Author:
    Steven Broussard, Elizabeth Harris, Jeremy Jalnos, Rebecca Simon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExpertAIPlayer(java.lang.String name)
      Constructs a new ExpertAIPlayer with the given String as the player's name.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Territory attackFrom()
      Attacks from the territory with the highest number of armies, which is adjacent to the territory that would make a continent easiest to conquer.
      Territory attackTo(Territory attackFrom)
      Finds and returns the enemy territory adjacent to the territory selected by attackFrom, which has the fewest armies.
      void placeArmy()
      place an army down in an empty continent or less then two armies in the continent.
      void reinforceArmies()
      At the end of a turn, player can move armies from one of their territories to an adjacent territory they own.

    • Method Detail

      • placeArmy

        public void placeArmy()
        place an army down in an empty continent or less then two armies in the continent. After the first army is placed, then clusters around the it and try to take over the continent.
        Specified by:
        placeArmy in class Player

      • reinforceArmies

        public void reinforceArmies()
        At the end of a turn, player can move armies from one of their territories to an adjacent territory they own. This method selects the relevant territories and the number of armies to move. Finds the smallest army owned and adds the required amount of armies to defend itself from the enemy in the adjacent territories
        Specified by:
        reinforceArmies in class Player

      • attackFrom

        public Territory attackFrom()
        Attacks from the territory with the highest number of armies, which is adjacent to the territory that would make a continent easiest to conquer.
        Specified by:
        attackFrom in class Player
        Returns:
        Territory

      • attackTo

        public Territory attackTo(Territory attackFrom)
        Finds and returns the enemy territory adjacent to the territory selected by attackFrom, which has the fewest armies.
        Specified by:
        attackTo in class Player
        Parameters:
        attackFrom -
        Returns:
        Territory
